AUTHOR: Thiebaut
PUB_PUB_TITLE: Description d'une nouvelle espèce de dorthèsia existante aux environs de Paris
PUB_PUB_PARENT_JOURNAL_TITLE: Mémoires de la Société Linnéenne de Paris
PUB_PUB_FORMATTED: Thiébaut de Berneaud, A. 1825. Description d'une nouvelle espèce de dorthèsia existante aux environs de Paris. Mémoires de la Société Linnéenne de Paris 3: 285-292

QUALIFICATION: nom. nud., see Lindinger, L. 1912. Die Schildläuse (Coccidae) Europas, Nordafrikas und Vorder-Asiens, einschliesslich der Azoren, der Kanaren und Madeiras. Stuttgart : E. Ulmer 388 pp. (364); Douglas, J.W. 1881. On the species of the genus Orthezia. Entomologist's Monthly Magazine 17: 172-176, 203-205 states that this species was cited by Burmeister, but that he was unable to find a description. Burmeister cites this species as Cocc. Glechomae Fabr. but there is no evidence of this species epithet in any of Fabricius' publications. Since no reference to this name can be found in Fabricius, Burmeister is listed as the author of the name
AUTHOR: Burmeister
PUB_PUB_TITLE: Scharlachlause. Schildläuse. Coccina. (Gallinsecta 1)
PUB_PUB_FORMATTED: Burmeister, H. 1835. Scharlachlause. Schildläuse. Coccina. (Gallinsecta 1). pp. 61-83 in Burmeister, H. (ed.). Handbuch der Entomologie. Berlin : T.F. Inslin Vol. 2(1).

QUALIFICATION: nom. nud.; Douglas, J.W. 1881. On the species of the genus Orthezia. Entomologist's Monthly Magazine 17: 172-176, 203-205states that Orthezia dispar Kaltenbach, was never described so far as I can ascertain; it is given thus by Kaltenbach in Die Pflanzenfeinde p. 486 (1874): 'Dortesia dispar? = urticae, Brm.' It is, therefore, merely a superfluous name.
